Title: Reorientation
Writer: Carson Mell, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Rachele Lynn (executive story editor), Shawn Boxe (story editor), Meghan Pleticha (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, Josh Brener, Martin Starr, Kumail Nanjiani
Plot: Richard faces challenges while trying to unite new employees; Jian-Yang goes to court; Gavin is questioned over his signature.
